metadata.dc:author: Ganter, B
Talhari, S
Cuba Caparo, A
metadata.dc:description: A case of Jorge Lobo's disease is described. According to the references consulted the case presented is the second in Peru. The patient is a native of the Peruvian jungle (River Madre de Dios, State Madre de Dios). The disease was restricted to the left ear. Clinical and histopathological aspects were typical of Lobo's disease.
metadata.dc:title: Enfermedad de Jorge Lobo. Segundo caso Peruano.
[Jorge Lobo's disease. Second Peruvian case].
